title: LoveLive! Series Presents COUNTDOWN LoveLive! 2021→2022 〜LIVE with a smile!〜
description: LoveLive! Series Presents COUNTDOWN LoveLive! 2021→2022 〜LIVE with a smile!〜 was a live concert event featuring Aqours, Nijigasaki High School Idol Club and Liella! that took place at PIA ARENA MM on December 31, 2021.
